extendedInfo.description: Fantasy LockScreen itâs a simple widget (1Ã1), which allows you activate LockScreen pattern.When door closed - Lock pattern is ON, otherwise OFF.API on 2.2 is closed now!To add widget press: Home->Menu->Add->Widgets->Fantasy LockScreenTo setup or change patten: Setings->Security&location->Change unclock pattern

reviews.comment: Please fix it!!!! All it does is take u to settings. The icon is so cute I really want to use it but it doesn\'t do anything!! HTC EVO 3D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I really want this app to work
reviews.comment: When you tap the widget it sends you to the lock set up screen, it doesn\'t open or close. PLEASE FIX! it would be extremely useful if it worked

reviews.comment: Worked perfect on my old phone tmobile g1. Door doesn\'t even open on new phone sprint evo shift :( just sends to settings menu.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: They aren\'t dumb.
reviews.comment: This app used to work differently a long time ago. The door could either be left open or closed with a tap. When closed your phone\'s security lock would be enabled, when tapped open your security lock would be disabled and the phone remained unlocked until you tapped it closed once again. Wish it still worked that way curve fish :/ ...worked great over a year ago.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: YOU GUYS ARE DUMB!
reviews.comment: are you guys serious right now? Even after I explained how to do it, you still got dumb people who can\'t figure it out. is this an april fools joke? it\'s not rocket science guys. you do know what this app it is right? It is an alternative to having to swipe your finger to unlock your phone. but depending on what kind of phone you have, you don\'t even need this app. all you do is create a pin, pass, or pattern, then lock your phone using the power button. it doesn\'t lock it for you. questions?
